articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Chonapho Fishery Institute
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Chonapho Fishery Institute
						
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the Chonapho Fishery Institute.
					 He said that, entering the institute, he missed very much leader Kim Jong Il who visited it two times, the last one in the year 2011, the last period of his life, adding that the institute was one of the precious legacies he left for the people.
					
					 Proposing the erection of the monument to the field guidance of Kim Jong Il in the compound of the institute to hand down it to posterity, he personally chose its site and named the institute the Chonapho Fishery Institute.
					
					 He looked round different places including artificial insemination room, roe development room, indoor and outdoor fish ponds, food processing factory and fish processing factory and set forth the tasks to be fulfilled by the institute.
					
					 Noting that what is essential for fish breeding is breeding fries, water and food, he underscored the need to intensify the research into species of fishes growing faster with less food, solve the issue of water fit for fish breeding and realize the local production of fish food.
					
					 He also underlined the need to select young and able talents and assign them to the institute, consolidate the science and technology dissemination base and work hard to actively introduce advanced science and technology.
					
					 He instructed the institute to boost the production of varieties of processed fishes.
					
					 He underscored the need for the institute to properly set the fish processing methods and varieties of processed fishes according to species of fishes as it is fully equipped with modern fish processing facilities, and produce quality processed fishes meeting the taste of people.
					
					 He stressed that to this end it was important for the officials and employees of the institute to steadily raise their responsibility and the level of their technical skills and meticulously manage equipment.
					
					 Calling for turning the area where the institute is located into a fishery village befitting the appearance of the highly civilized socialist state, he took benevolent measures to do so.
					
					 He repeatedly instructed the institute to achieve successes in researches into fish breeding and keep production going at a high rate.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the KPA General Political Bureau, and Han Kwang Sang, department director of the C.C. the WPK.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Leave
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Leave
						
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Rim Min Sik, chairman of the Overseas Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, and his party left here on Thursday.
					 Leaving here on the same day were the advisors delegation of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan led by Kim So Ja, advisor to the Central Standing Committee of the union, and the home-visiting group of students of Korean high schools in Japan headed by Sin Kil Ung, principal of Tokyo Korean Middle and High School.

articles.title: KPA Service Personnel Visit Yuphyong Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
KPA Service Personnel Visit Yuphyong Revolutionary Site
 Changsong, July 17 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Korean People's Army continue visiting revolutionary sites in various parts of the country and making study tour of them on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 After touring the Changgol Revolutionary Site on Tuesday, they arrived at the Yuphyong Revolutionary Site in Changsong County, North Phyongan Province on Wednesday.
					
					 It is the place where President Kim Il Sung instilled faith in sure victory into service personnel and learned in detail about the war-time farming in the village on October 26, Juche 39 (1950), showing deep loving care for the peasants there.
					
					 The visitors laid bouquets before an oil painting depicting the President and paid tribute to him.
					
					 Their visit to the site provided them with an opportunity to more clearly realize how such a historical victory was won in the war against the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces.
					
					 A briefing on the greatness of the peerless great persons of Mt. Paektu took place there.
					
					 Those who took the floor praised the President who, possessed of rare military wisdom, commanding art and warm love as his inborn disposition, led the war to victory and provided heroic Korea's history and tradition of victory in the war.
					
					 On the same day there took place a shooting contest of service personnel.
					
					 During the days of the visit and study tour service personnel gave sincere helping hands to the builders in various construction sites and took warm care of the living of war veterans.

articles.title: 60th Anniversary of Chilgol Revolutionary Museum Marked
articles.content:
60th Anniversary of Chilgol Revolutionary Museum Marked
						
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- It is 60 years since the Chilgol Revolutionary Museum was founded.
					 The museum is located in Mangyongdae District, Pyongyang.
					
					 On display at the museum are revolutionary and historic relics on the days of President Kim Il Sung at Changdok School, relics and mementoes on the revolutionary activities of Kang Pan Sok, his mother, and those conveying the patriotic will of the relatives on the mother's side.
					
					 It has played its responsible role for equipping service personnel and people with the revolutionary traditions of the Workers' Party of Korea over the past six decades.
					
					 A meeting was held on Thursday to mark the anniversary.
					
					 A congratulatory letter to the officials and employees of the museum sent by the Central Committee of the WPK was conveyed at the meeting.
					
					 The letter highly praised them for creditably performing their duty of firmly upholding and widely explaining the revolutionary traditions of Juche by devoting all their wisdom and enthusiasm with intensive loyalty and noble sense of moral obligation towards the peerless great persons.

articles.title: Nano-gold Injection Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Nano-gold Injection Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The Nano Technology Institute under Kim Il Sung University in the DPRK developed nano-gold injection, a combination of nano-gold and various kinds of natural bioproducts.
					 The injection is efficacious for immunity invigoration, inflammation, pain, neurosis, cerebration and blood circulation, promotion of metabolism and effacement of active oxygen. It also removes poisoning by medicine or chemicals.
					
					 According to Kim Sung Chol, a researcher of the institute, nano-gold shows rapid pharmacological action in human body. Its particle is smaller than 20-30nm in size and the injection is especially good for rheumatic arthritis, liver diseases, diabetes and cancerous diseases.
					
					 The injection won a high appreciation at the 29th National Festival of Science and Technology and the 17th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair.

articles.title: Rosy Is Future of DPRK Led by Marshal Kim Jong Un: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Rosy Is Future of DPRK Led by Marshal Kim Jong Un: Rodong Sinmun 
						
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday dedicates an editorial to the second anniversary of conferment of the title of Marshal of the DPRK upon supreme leader Kim Jong Un. 
					 The bestowal of the title upon Kim Jong Un on July 17, Juche 101 (2012) was a historic event of great significance in firmly preserving the lifeline of the Juche revolution, Songun revolution, and hastening the final victory of the great Paektusan nation, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 The past two years were the glorious days when the personality of Kim Jong Un as a peerless great man was fully proved. 
					
					 He has energetically led the service personnel and people of the DPRK with his gifted wisdom, distinguished organizing ability and noble virtues so that eye-opening events and miracles unprecedented in the revolution and construction were registered one after another. 
					
					 He brought about a new turn in the building of the party and army and called upon all the service personnel and people to turn out in the drive for building an economic power and a highly civilized country and opened a brilliant era in this land where the dream and ideal of the people come true. 
					
					 A fresh heyday has been opened in the revolution and construction since the DPRK was led by Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Thanks to his leadership all the days and months in the new century of Juche have been recorded as an epic of love for the people unknown in the world. 
					
					 The harmonious whole of the leader, service personnel and people is the great pride and strength of the DPRK and we will achieve the final victory at any cost with the great might of single-minded unity. 
					
					 The editorial calls upon all the people to work hard for the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche, holding high the red flag of the party and the colors of the Supreme Commander shining with the star of Marshal true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Songun Politics Provides Sure Guarantee for Defending Peace and Achieving National Prosperity: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Songun Politics Provides Sure Guarantee for Defending Peace and Achieving National Prosperity: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Songun politics is a mighty treasured sword to reliably defend the peace on the Korean peninsula and the security of the nation and a great banner providing a sure guarantee for achieving the prosperity of the nation, says Rodong Sinmun in article Thursday.
					 It says:
					
					 It is the hard reality that if the military muscle of a country is weak, it is impossible to protect its sovereignty and vital rights, and it would become a plaything of the imperialists and fall victim to their policy of aggression.
					
					 The situation on the Korean peninsula is so tense for a long period of the nation's division by foreign forces that it may suffer the disaster of a nuclear war anytime.
					
					 However, a war has been averted under such a tense situation and the provokers have not realized their attempt at invasion. This is ascribable to the powerful military deterrence of the DPRK.
					
					 Independence, the life of the nation, and the security and happiness of the fellow countrymen would be unthinkable without the Songun politics.
					
					 The future of the nation is linked with the lasting peace on the Korean peninsula and national reunification. It is very clear that there can be no bright future of the country and the nation as long as foreign forces are trying to dominate the whole of the Korean peninsula by force and the tragedy of national division persists.
					
					 Challenges of foreign forces for aggression to lay a stumbling block in the way of carving out the independent destiny of the Korean nation should be deterred by dint of Songun.
					
					 No Korea and its nation without the Songun politics shedding its rays as the symbol of independence and dignity.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Keen on Joint Naval Military Exercises
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Keen on Joint Naval Military Exercises
						
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist aggression forces are kicking off joint military exercises against the DPRK in the waters north of Jeju Island and southwest of Mokpho, South Jolla Province on Wednesday in league with the south Korean military warmongers, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 Involved there are huge attack forces including nuclear carrier George Washington, cruiser and Aegis ship of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces and Aegis ship of the south Korean navy. They are hell-bent on the war maneuvers to mount a pre-emptive nuclear attack on the DPRK from the waters.
					
					 The warlike forces describe the war maneuvers which will last for several days as "ordinary ones" but they can never conceal a cynic ploy to quell the atmosphere of the Korean nation's reconciliation and cooperation and ignite a nuclear war against the north at any cost.
					
					 Such dangerous maneuvers are escalating the military tensions on the Korean peninsula so that a war may break out anytime.

articles.title: Serious River Pollution under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
Serious River Pollution under Fire in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The River Yongsan of south Korea is seriously polluted owing to the project of the four large rivers pushed forward under the Lee Myung Bak regime, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Minbo on July 13. 
					 The paper said:
					
					 Various sections of the river are blocked by dams, rapidly worsening the quality of water. Water in some sections is so seriously contaminated that people may easily find the water dirty. Consequently, fishes and a lot of other living organisms die en masse. 
					
					 People living near the river said that they did not see such phenomena before the project of the four large rivers. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean authorities are resorting to all sorts of gimmicks to calm down the protest, claiming that the water is drinkable if it is purified and that no poisonous substance was detected in the water. 
					
					 In this regard, south Korean people from all walks of life chide the authorities, querying them can they drink the water as they claim there is no problem in the quality of water though grass is lush under water.

articles.title: S. Korean Ruling Forces' Persecution of Bereaved Families of Ferry Sewol Disaster Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Ruling Forces' Persecution of Bereaved Families of Ferry Sewol Disaster Assailed
						
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The conservative ruling forces came under fire by an editorial of Kyunghyang Daily News of south Korea on July 14 for watching and incriminating bereaved families of victims of the ferry Sewol sinking disaster.
					 The editorial recalled that the bereaved families have been on a hunger strike in Seoul since July 13 in demand of the institution of a special law for thoroughly probing the truth about the Sewol disaster, severely punishing those responsible for it and preventing the recurrence of the similar accident.
					
					 What matters is that the "government" and the ruling party which are responsible for the disaster are watching the bereaved families as suspected criminals and insulting them with unspeakable invectives, far from feeling guilty, it charged, adding:
					
					 When those bereaved families staged a march to Daejon via Paengmok Port on Jin Island from Ansan City to seek a speedy rescue of those missing, detectives of the Kongju Police Station shadowed them, riding cars, only to be spotted.
					
					 Detectives belonging to the Intelligence Department of Tanwon Police Station were also spotted while shadowing families of victims and an intelligence police officer was caught red-handed at Jindo Stadium to face a strong protest.
					
					 The above-said actions against the bereaved families go to prove that the tears shed by not a few "government" authorities including the "president" and promises made by them in the "apology to the people" were no more than hypocrisy and lies to tide over crisis.

articles.title: Halt to Nuclear War Drills Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Halt to Nuclear War Drills Demanded in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The People's Action for Peace against War in south Korea on Wednesday made public a statement denouncing the joint military drills of war maniacs, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Thongil News. 
					 The south Korean military authorities claim that the joint drills with the U.S. nuclear carrier George Washington and other warships involved are ordinary maneuvers, but the entry of the offensive nuclear carrier itself cannot be interpreted otherwise than a hostile military action, the statement held. 
					
					 It queried is there any need for the nuclear carrier to be involved in the search and rescue drill to be staged with Japan. 
					
					 The military maneuvers are nothing but a demonstration of armed forces and a military action of supporting the moves of Japan for reinvasion in the light of the fact that naval activities are the main contents the Japanese government specified in the category of the exercise of the "right to collective self-defense," it said, adding:
					
					 Such military drills were staged before but the disaster of the ferry Sewol clearly proved that they were utterly ineffective. 
					
					 The statement demanded the warlike forces stop at once the joint military drills.

articles.title: Koreans in Kyrgyzstan Demand S. Korean Authorities Respond to Statement of DPRK Government
articles.content:
Koreans in Kyrgyzstan Demand S. Korean Authorities Respond to Statement of DPRK Government 
						
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Pak Kyong Ho, chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan, released a statement on July 9 in support of the statement of the DPRK government. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 The DPRK government made public a statement on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of the last autograph left by President Kim Il Sung on the historic document concerning national reunification. The statement is infusing a new hope and conviction of the improved north-south relations and Korea's reunification into the fellow countrymen in the north, the south and abroad and arousing the Koreans to the patriotic struggle for national reunification.
					
					 The statement clearly reflects the principled and consistent stand of the DPRK government to do away the obstacles facing the nation, improve the inter-Korean relations and open a new epochal phase of independent reunification.
					
					 The United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan fully supports the statement, representing the ardent desire and patriotic will of overseas Koreans for national reunification.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should resolutely break with the inglorious past and opt for mending the relations as soon as possible in response to the statement of the DPRK government.
					
					 The Koreans in Kyrgyzstan will dynamically turn out in the nationwide struggle to usher in the second June 15 era of reunification under the banner of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: DPRK Government's Statement Supported
articles.content:
DPRK Government's Statement Supported
						
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. issued a statement on July 7 in support of the statement of the DPRK government.
					 The statement of the DPRK government reflects the firm will of First Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Un to carry out the last instructions for national reunification of President Kim Il Sung and Chairman of the NDC Kim Jong Il, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 All the proposals advanced in the statement are reasonable ones that arouse sympathy from all the Koreans aspiring after the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 It is natural that the will of the north for peace to settle the complicated issues between the north and the south through dialogue, not by a war, commands support and welcome from fellow countrymen.
					
					 It is a very foolish act to continue denying the north's proposals in order to maintain power.
					
					 The implementation of the four proposals offered by the north will mark a turning phase for improving the north-south relations and advancing toward peaceful reunification.
					
					 The DPRK's government statement carrying the reasonable proposals is very necessary for the interests and prosperity common to the nation.
					
					 The Federation of Koreans in the U.S. will hold hands with pro-reunification patriotic forces in the north, the south and abroad and conduct positive solidarity activities for implementing the statement to improve the north-south relations and greet a new turning phase of independent reunification.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Korean in U.S.
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Korean in U.S.
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Ro Kil Nam, representative of the Minjok Thongsin, an internet newspaper of Koreans in the U.S., released an article titled "Life of President Kim Il Sung is characterized by history of independent reunification" on July 5. 
					 The article said:
					
					 On the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of the President, I am recalling with deep emotion the life of the President, the peerless patriot who defeated formidable U.S. and Japanese imperialist enemies in one generation, achieved the historic cause of national liberation, built a society of single-minded unity and devoted himself to achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea till the last moments of his great life. 
					
					 The position and role of the President in the history of the Korean nation are great, indeed.
					
					 The President led members of the Korean nation to always hold high the banner of the great national unity to achieve independence and sovereignty of the country and put an end to the national division, regardless of differences in ideology, religious belief and political view. 
					
					 During the days the July 4 joint statement was adopted and the three principles of national reunification, the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation were advanced. 
					
					 The President examined the document related to national reunification even in the last moments of his great life and left his historic autograph on it. 
					
					 The historic cause of national reunification to which the President devoted himself is being successfully carried forward under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings, seminars, photo and book exhibitions and film shows took place in Pakistan, India, Peru and Tunisia between July 6 and 10 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the immortal exploits performed by Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On display there were photos and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation".
					
					 The secretary general of the Karachi Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association said that the President founded and developed the Workers' Party of Korea, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the Korean People's Army, adding that his career and immortal exploits will shine forever along with socialist Korea.
					
					 The principal of an Indian school noted that the President performed the great exploits for the era and history by founding the immortal Juche idea and leading the revolution and construction to victory.
					
					 The general secretary of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru stated that the President is the eternal banner of victory of the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence and the lodestar of unity.
					
					 The chairman of the Tunisian Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung and other personages expressed belief that the cause of building a thriving nation will be surely realized in the DPRK led by Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the cause of the President and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the remembrance meeting held in Pakistan.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreign Newspapers
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried special write-ups illustrated with the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung and his photos on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.
					 The Mozambican newspaper Noticias on July 8 in an article titled "The DPRK remembering President Kim Il Sung" praised the exploits performed by the President, the founder of the DPRK, in the efforts for state building and national reunification, saying that his demise was a great loss not only to the Korean people but to the world progressive people.
					
					 The Zambian newspaper Zambia Daily Mail on July 7 in an article titled "Father of the people: President Kim Il Sung's brilliant feats" said that the benevolent image of the President who took warm care of the people's living, always finding himself among them, was deeply kept in the hearts of the Korean people as the image of their real father.
					
					 The July 3rd issue of the Namibian newspaper New Era edited articles titled "Model of internationalist", "For global independence" and "Eternal sun" under the headline of "In memory of the great man".
					
					 It said that the greatest exploit performed by the President for global independence was that he strengthened the non-aligned movement.
					
					 The Indian newspaper New Delhi Times on July 8 carried articles titled "20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung".
					
					 The Indian newspaper Science Technology and Education News on July 7 carried an article dealing with the peerless great man's outlook on the people and rising generation.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Is Great Master of Ideology and Leadership: Syrian, Ugandan Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Is Great Master of Ideology and Leadership: Syrian, Ugandan Figures
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Syrian and Ugandan figures issued statements on July 6 and 8 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The head of a department of the Political Faculty of the University of Damascus of Syria said that the President was the father of socialist Korea who liberated the country usurped by the Japanese imperialists and founded the DPRK, the genuine country of the people, and the exploits performed by him for the cause of global independence would be everlasting.
					
					 The chairman of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement noted:
					
					 The President was the great master of ideology and leadership who made sure that the Korean people could defend their own ideology and social system despite all challenges and pressures by the imperialists.
					
					 The Juche idea founded by him serves as the precious textbook helping the African countries stand against the imperialists' neo-colonial policy and make social progress.
					
					 I sincerely wish HE Kim Jong Un and the Korean people successes in the struggle for peace, stability and development of the DPRK.

articles.title: Serbian Political Figure Supports Statement of DPRK Government
articles.content:
Serbian Political Figure Supports Statement of DPRK Government
						
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Batric Mijovic, general secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia, issued a statement on July 10 in support of the statement of the DPRK government.
					 He said:
					
					 I fully support the statement of the DPRK government calling for putting an end to the reckless hostility and confrontation, improving the north-south relations and ushering in a fresh turning phase of independent reunification.
					
					 The statement most correctly reflects the unanimous aspiration of all Korean people for national reunification and requirement of the situation prevailing on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities really want the improved north-south relations and reunification, they should drop their treacherous policy for confrontation, positively respond to the affirmative proposal of the DPRK government at an early date and stop all their joint military drills for aggression with foreign forces.
					
					 I extend firm support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for reunifying the country by their own efforts without any interference by foreign forces.

articles.title: Romanian Party Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Escalating Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen
articles.content:
Romanian Party Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Escalating Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen
						
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The Party for the Socialist Choice of Romania made public a statement on July 10 in support of the statement of the DPRK government.
					 It said:
					
					 The DPRK government in a statement offered a realistic proposal for mending the inter-Korean relations and opening a new turning phase of independent reunification.
					
					 The statement that was released in the wake of the crucial proposal made by the National Defence Commission of the DPRK is indicative of the steadfast peace-loving stand of the DPRK.
					
					 The Party for the Socialist Choice of Romania fully supports the principled stand of the DPRK to reject interference of foreign forces and reunify the country by the Korean nation itself the way agreed upon between the north and the south.
					
					 The situation is so dangerous on the Korean peninsula and in its vicinity that a war may break out any moment as a huge U.S. nuclear war hardware is amassed there.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are staging large-scale war drills without letup in collusion with the U.S.
					
					 They should positively respond to the patriotic call of the DPRK, bearing in mind that confrontation with the fellow countrymen would only bring destruction.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Instituto de Pesqueria de Chonapho
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Instituto de Pesqueria de Chonapho
						
Pyongyang, 17 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio el Instituto de Pesqueria de Chonapho.
					Al entrar en el instituto le viene a la mente la imagen del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien visito este lugar en dos ocasiones inclusive 2011, ultimo periodo de su vida, dijo y agrego que el instituto es uno de nobles patrimonios dejados por el por el pueblo.
					
					Diciendo que se debe construir en el recinto del instituto el monumento en memoria de visita de orientacion del Dirigente para transmitir eternamente sus proezas, el Mariscal fijo el solar y denomino esta unidad como el Instituto de Pesqueria de Chonapho.
					
					Al recorrer la sala de incubacion artificial, la de crecimiento de huevas, los criaderos bajo techo y al aire libre, la fabrica de elaboracion de pienso, la de elaboracion de pescados y otros lugares, presento las tareas del instituto.
					
					Anadio que lo basico en la piscicultura es la especie, agua y pienso y destaco que el instituto debe profundizar la investigacion de los peces de rapido crecimiento con pocos piensos, resolver el problema de agua adecuada a la piscicultura y realizar la produccion de piensos domesticos.
					
					Hay que seleccionar y ubicar en el instituto a las personas jovenes y competentes, acondicionar bien la base de divulgacion de ciencia y tecnica y esforzarse activamente por introducir la ciencia y tecnologia sofisticadas, enseno.
					
					El instituto debe producir mucho varios productos elaborados de pescados, ordeno.
					
					Dijo que conforme a las modernas instalaciones de elaboracion de pescados el instituto debe definir correctamente el metodo de elaboracion y la variedad de los productos elaborados de pescados y producir los productos de buena calidad adecuados al gusto de los habitantes coreanos.
					
					Para este fin, hay que elevar de continuo la responsabilidad y el nivel de tecnica y habilidad de los funcionarios y empleados del instituto, enfatizo.
					
					Senalo que se debe convertir esta zona donde esta situado el instituto en una aldea pesquera propicia a la figura de un Estado civilizado socialista y tomo medidas para el particular.
					
					Encomendo repetidamente que el instituto debe lograr exitos en la investigacion de piscicultura y normalizar en el nivel alto la produccion.
					
					El Mariscal fue acompanado por el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC y el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC Han Kwang Sang.

articles.title: Militares coreanos visitan lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de Yuphyong
articles.content:
Militares coreanos visitan lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de Yuphyong
Changsong, 17 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 61o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, tienen lugar por doquier del pais la visita y el recorrido de los militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea por los lugares de interes historico-revolucionario.
					Tras la visita del dia 15 al lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de Changgol, los uniformados llegaron el dia 16 al lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de Yuphyong, situado en el distrito de Changsong de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte.
					
					El 26 de octubre del 39 (1950) de la Era Juche, el Presidente Kim Il Sung infundio ahi en los oficiales y soldados del EPC la fe en la victoria y averiguo como los campesinos aldeanos labran la tierra en el tiempo de guerra.
					
					Los visitantes rindieron homenaje al Generalisimo tras depositar ramos de flores ante la pintura al oleo con la imagen de el.
					
					Durante su recorrido, los militares pudieron conocer mejor como se ha preparado el milagro historico de lograr la victoria fulminante al derrotar a las fuerzas aliadas imperialistas encabezadas por EE.UU.
					
					Tuvo lugar el encuentro de explicacion sobre las nobles personalidades de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu.
					
					Los oradores elogiaron al Presidente Kim Il Sung quien con su extraordinaria prevision militar, arte de mando y amor por los soldados, dirigio a la victoria la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria y preparo la historia y la tradicion de victoria de la Corea heroina.
					
					Este dia, tuvo lugar la competencia de tiro de los militares del EPC. 
					
					En los dias de recorrido, ellos realizaron trabajos voluntarios en varios campos de construccion y ayudaron a los veteranos de guerra en sus faenas del hogar.

articles.title: Museo de Historia Revolucionaria de Chilgol acoge 60o aniversario de su fundacion
articles.content:
Museo de Historia Revolucionaria de Chilgol acoge 60o aniversario de su fundacion
Pyongyang, 17 de julio (ACNC) -- El Museo de la Historia Revolucionaria de Chilgol, situado en el capitalino municipio de Mangyongdae, acogio el 60o aniversario de su fundacion.
					En el museo estan expuestos los datos alusivos a las actividades del Presidente Kim Il Sung durante su estudio en la Escuela Changdok y los objetos y datos que testimonian las actividades revolucionarias de Kang Pan Sok, madre del Presidente, y el proposito patriotico de los familiares de el por linea materna.
					
					Durante 60 anos, el museo realizo con responsabilidad las labores para armar a los militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea y los habitantes con la tradicion revolucionaria del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 17 el acto conmemorativo por esa efemeride.
					
					En la ocasion se dio lectura al mensaje de felicitacion remitido por el Comite Central del PTC a los funcionarios y empleados del museo.
					
					En su misiva, el CC del PTC los evaluo altamente destacando que ellos vinieron cumpliendo con su deber de defensores resueltos y propagandistas activos de las tradiciones revolucionarias del Juche trabajando con noble fidelidad y obligacion moral a los grandes hombres sin pares y dedicando toda su inteligencia y pasion.

articles.title: Desarrollada en RPDC inyeccion nano-oro
articles.content:
Desarrollada en RPDC inyeccion nano-oro
						
Pyongyang, 17 de julio (ACNC) -- Recientemente, el Instituto de Tecnologia Nano de la Universidad Kim Il Sung de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea desarrollo la inyeccion nano-oro de alta eficacia en el tratamiento medico.
					La inyeccion se usa en renacimiento de inmunidad, la paliacion de inflamacion, dolor y nervio, la mejora de la funcion de cerebro y la circulacion de sangre, el fomento de metabolismo y la eliminacion de oxigeno activo, y liquida la intoxicacion por medicina y materias quimicas.
					
					El nano-oro hace elevar la inmunidad del cuerpo controlando el equilibrio de electrolito de celulas destruidas.
					
					El colectivo de la investigacion desarrollo la tecnologia de estabilidad de nano-granulo y obtuvo granulo nano-oro.
					
					Segun el investigador Kim Sung Chol, el nano-oro extiende rapidamente en el cuerpo y hace aparecer la accion medicinal del oro.
					
					La inyeccion contiene las materias activas naturales que aumentan mas la accion medicinal.
					
					El granulo de nano-oro de 20-30nm tiene alto osmosis y el caracter de adsorcion y excrecion de las sustancias nocivas y toxicas sedimentadas en los intestinos.
					
					Es casi 100 por ciento la eficacia de tratamiento inflamatoria y enfermedad toxica por materia medicinal y surte alto efecto en la curacion de artritis reumatico, hepatitis, diabetes y la enfermedad cancerosa.
					
					La inyeccion de nano-oro obtuvo el primer lugar en el 29o Festival Nacional de Ciencias y Tecnicas de este ano y se aumenta cada dia mas la demanda de esta inyeccion despues de presentarse en la XVII Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias Primaveral de Pyongyang.
